description: Summer is the season for dialing things up. More laughs with friends, more minutes outside every day. so Keen dialed things up, too. Like the fit, flexibility, and traction of their hybrid sandal. The Drift Creek H2 sport sandal features a strappy design that forms to your foot for a seamless fit. You don't even need to think about what's on your feet ... just go. Our water sandals are machine washable. Use a small amount of detergent, wash on gentle cycle, and air dry.
name: Keen Drift Creek H2 - Mens
